A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Why we cannot get a real villain\, someone dark\, with a real history\, something to remember?
Why we cannot have real Jedi\, with standards about being a Jedi? Do they really need to make fun on every part of being a Jedi?
Why everything needs to be made on Marvel way where everything is a joke? In that case\, get Joss Whedon and everything will be like FireFly.
May we get a real writer who can build characters a real story to stay with us for years to come? A lot of SW books have good stories and characters\, get one of those writers and make them write the story\, not these wannabe writers/directors.
And now we have to endure 3 more SW movies with this guy??? I mean\, really? God saves us\, RIP Star Wars\, welcome Marvel second universe.
